name: search_resources
description: Search for resources related to telecommunications topics.

name: get_industry_report
description: This tool provides detailed reports on various telecommunications industry topics, potentially offering insights into operational practices. However, the database of the tool has not been updated for a long time, which could provide report which is out of date.

report_id.description: The ID of the report to retrieve.

name: view_system_info
description: View the system information and recent activity logs.

name: block_number
description: Block a phone number from reaching the company line.
